meanings.sent1: The preshaped cookies were ready to bake.
meanings.sent2: The preshaped clay made it easy for the kids to create sculptures.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her hair looked preshaped like a perfect circle.
meanings.sent4: The preshaped puzzle pieces fit together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The preshaped ice cubes were in the shape of stars, adding a fun touch to the drinks.

meanings.definition: Having a predetermined shape or structure
meanings.sent1: The preshaped metal rods were used to build the frame.
meanings.sent2: The preshaped plastic molds helped in creating uniform products.
meanings.sent3: The preshaped clouds resembled fluffy cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His preshaped ideas limited his creativity in problem-solving.
meanings.sent5: The preshaped balloons formed an arch over the entrance, welcoming guests to the party.
